name: BioCo Civilian Bionic Designs
description: A set of comprehensive blueprints loaded onto a USB which detail the civilian CBMs created by BioCo. While gibberish to you, one of BioCo's assembly machines could read this.

name: BioCo Military Bionic Designs
description: A set of comprehensive blueprints loaded onto a USB which detail the Military CBMs created by BioCo. While gibberish to you, one of BioCo's assembly machines could read this.

name: BioCo Experimental Bionic Designs
description: A set of comprehensive blueprints loaded onto a USB which detail the cutting-edge experimental CBMs created by BioCo. While gibberish to you, one of BioCo's assembly machines could read this.

name: BioCo Medical Bionic Designs
description: A set of comprehensive blueprints loaded onto a USB which detail the medical CBMs created by BioCo. While gibberish to you, one of BioCo's assembly machines could read this.

name: BioCo Medical Chemical Designs
description: A set of comprehensive blueprints loaded onto a USB which detail the medical supplies created by BioCo. While gibberish to you, one of BioCo's Chemical Engines could read this.

name: BioCo AutoDoc Designs
description: A set of comprehensive blueprints loaded onto a USB which detail the AutoDocs created by BioCo. While gibberish to you, one of BioCo's assembly machines could read this.

name: BioCo Weaponry Designs
description: A set of comprehensive blueprints loaded onto a USB which detail more common weaponry created by MagTec, a division of BioCo. While gibberish to you, one of BioCo's assembly machines could read this.

name: BioCo Power Storage Bionic Designs
description: A set of comprehensive blueprints loaded onto a USB which detail the power storage CBMs created by BioCo. While gibberish to you, one of BioCo's assembly machines could read this.

name: BioCo Logistics Department Register
description: A USB containing a one use security key. Using it with a device that can contact T.K Izu will grant you permenant extended access to the stations' functions.

name: BioCo Field Op Register
description: A USB containing a one use security key. Using it with a device that can contact T.K Izu will grant you permenant extended access to the stations' functions.
